timelines.title: 2015 - Present
timelines.heading: Freelance + Consultancy Services
timelines.body: Providing consultancy services for web / mobile development for large scale CMS websites or client-side web apps.

timelines.heading: Font-end Developer | Isobar Canada
timelines.body: Collaborated with art director, project managers and designers to develop websites, social promotion campaigns for Canadian Art, J.P.Wiser's, mackenzie investments and Mattel Canada.

timelines.heading: Contractor | Pitney Bowes Toronto
timelines.body: Contracted under IT Angecy, working on site with clients, resposbile for web application compatibility testing and issue fixing.

timelines.heading: Web Master | Open Jaw Network
timelines.body: Responsible for two websites maintenance and features updates including Front-end and Back-end.

services.heading: Custom Web Development
services.text: Providing quick reponse problem solving solution with our expert architechts and wed developers and keep our development works with latest cutting-edge technology.

services.heading: Web And Application Design
services.text: Using the latest frameworks combined with responsive HTML5 and CSS3 to create unique, reliable and mobile presence for your brand or ogranization.

services.heading: Web Application Security
services.text: Reliable service for Known Web Security Vulnerabilities and Unknown Vulnerabilities, Providing affordable and quick solution for small and large size orgnizations
